author: SuperCarlinBrothers
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp - go to http://betterhelp.com/super to get 10% off your first month.

Was Snape’s love for Lily literally hidden by a Fidelius Charm? Today we dive into one of the wildest (and most convincing!) Harry Potter theories ever.

In today’s episode, Ben explores a massive revelation about Severus Snape, Albus Dumbledore, and the Fidelius Charm — and how one magically concealed secret may have shaped the entire wizarding war.

Why did nobody — not the Marauders, not McGonagall, not Voldemort himself — ever put together Snape’s obvious love for Lily? 

#HarryPotter #SuperCarlinBrothers 

Written by: J & Ben Carlin
Edited by: Isybelle Christley

title: Dumbledore Was Snape’s Secret Keeper?! | Harry Potter Theory
